      • translate

        public java.lang.String translate(TranslationKeys key)
        Description copied from interface: TranslatorSpec
        Looks up translation for specified key; uses current locale of UI. If UI not yet instantiated, default locale will be taken instead.
        Specified by:
        translate in interface TranslatorSpec
        Parameters:
        key - Key for looking up translations
        Returns:
